name: Sorlo The Platformer Wizard
description:
Sorlo The Platformer Wizard

A platformer game that where you play as a wizard. Play through levels collecting keys to open doors, shooting magic to defeat trolls and advancing through the levels.

Scores are based on how quickly you finish the level.

*/Game is easy on desktop and PC's with a keyboard\*

*/Game is challenging on Mobile Platforms(Mobile not available yet but in testing)\*

*CONTROLS*

PC-

Arrow Keys to move.

Z key is the action key. Used for shooting magic once acquired and opening doors.

Mobile-

Arrow keys to move

Biggest key is the action key.
